publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-882 Tricia Marwick: Scottish Affairs Select Committee - Election of MSPs-That the Parliament notes the report by the Scottish Affairs Select Committee published on 3 February 2004; further notes the motion that the Parliament passed on 27 March 2002 on the size of the Scottish Parliament; believes that any modification to the number of the Parliament's elected representatives and the system by which they are elected should be a matter for the Parliament, and considers that, until such time as this Parliament has sovereignty for all matters related to its operation, the House of Commons should not amend the Scotland Act 1998 unless such changes have the consent of the Parliament.

S2M-882 Scottish Affairs Select Committee - Election of MSPs (lodged on 6 February 2004) Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Fiona Hyslop*, Rob Gibson*, Mark Ballard*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Linda Fabiani*, Mr Bruce McFee*, Fergus Ewing*, Brian Adam*, Richard Lochhead*

S2M-882 Scottish Affairs Select Committee - Election of MSPs (lodged on 6 February 2004) Bruce Crawford*, Jim Mather*, Carolyn Leckie*, Frances Curran*, Robin Harper*, Shona Robison*, Patrick Harvie*, Alex Neil*
S2M-882 Scottish Affairs Select Committee - Election of MSPs (lodged on 6 February 2004) Eleanor Scott*, Dennis Canavan*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S2M-882 Scottish Affairs Select Committee - Election of MSPs (lodged on 6 February 2004) Ms Sandra White*, John Swinburne*
S2M-882 Scottish Affairs Select Committee - Election of MSPs (lodged on 6 February 2004) Chris Ballance*
S2M-882 Scottish Affairs Select Committee - Election of MSPs (lodged on 6 February 2004) Dr Jean Turner*
